Label: containsTargetEntity
Description: Defines the link between the NER task experiment and its target entities that the models will be trained to predict

Label: executedBy
Description: Experiments executed by workflow

Label: predictedByModel
Description: Generation of a predictive model as a product of an operation execution

Label: generatesModel
Description: Generation of a predictive model as a product of an operation execution

Label: hasScore
Description: Correlates the model evaluation settings with the scores

Label: hasSummaryPrediction
Description: Generation of a predictive model as a product of an operation execution

Label: describedBy
Description: Classes may be described by an object of Quality class of its subclasses that specify characteristics

Label: applyTaggingFormat
Description: Sets up a chunck style formatting IO

Label: generatesDataset
Description: Generation of a dataset as a product of an operation execution

Label: belongsToEntity
Description: Specify the name of the entity related to the score instance

Label: fromEvaluationMetric
Description: It can be used to specify the model parameters hyper parameters

Label: finetunedFrom
Description: Specify whether a new produced ML model was refined from an LLM model

Label: hasParameter
Description: It can be used to specify the model parameters hyper parameters

Label: containsProcedure
Description: Specify an internal functionality of a workflow
Range: xmlpo.Operation # a functional step of the workflow

Label: useInputData
Description: Correlates operation with some declared input data

Label: underContext
Description: Describes stage of the workflow in which the scores were computed

Label: hasReplicateNumber
Description: The replicate index of the asset model or other output

Label: aggregatedByStatsFunction
Description: Describes statistical function used to aggregate the model replicate values of evaluation metrics

Label: hasPredictedItemsCount
Description: Number of words predicted to belong to certain entity

Label: isAggregatedValue
Description: Describes whether the value of the score instance is a result of an statistical aggregation function min

Label: reportLevel
Description: Describes the level that the score was computed word or token
